channel.title: MocroScape | 498 & 667 | Wildy Bosses | New Duel System(Classic)
channel.description:
MocroScape | 498 & 667 | Wildy Bosses | New Duel System(Classic)
[CENTER][SIZE=1]Hi My Name is Mocro. First of all before i begin Sorry For My Bad English.[/SIZE]
Lets Begin.
[IMG]http://mocro.net/intro/images/intro_shop_02.png[/img]
[CENTER][B][FONT=Times New Roman][COLOR="#ff6600"]This is a unique server i always try to make somthing different then other servers. My base i used is DawnTained. I edit allot of unique parts in the server it self and im still not done![/COLOR][/FONT][/B][/CENTER]
[SPOILER=What does MocroScape has to offer?] [CODE] Stable Econemy Custom Wildy Bosses Duelling at home (right click challange and fight there) DailyTask ( Get a special reward evryday when doing a simple Task) All Drops of all Npc's ( That means you can get special items from npc's) 498 Data with 667 Items (Characters and some items npcs are 498 data rest is 667). Animation are 602
DawnTained Specs:
Clean gameplay. Alot is documented. Every skill is fully working. Unique lottery system. Everything clipped. Player vs player combat damage is calculated when the weapon animation starts. Player vs player formulas are rewritten with realistic results. Achievement system. Nomad will spawn in a random spot in multi wilderness each time it dies. Commands converted to clickable buttons on the Notetab. EP drop system. Target system. Player killing farming tracking system. Pet system, supports every pet. In-game highscores with saving, Kills, Deaths and KDR, top 10 players. Completionist Cape fully customizable into 10+ colours Quick prayers. [/CODE] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Images Ingame] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/1.png[/img] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/2.png[/img] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/3.png[/img] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/5.png[/img] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/6.png[/img] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/7.png[/img] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/8.png[/img] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/9.png[/img] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/10.png[/img] [IMG]http://mocro.net/runescape/ingame/11.png[/img]
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Updates for the Future!] [CODE] House System. Workers System. [/CODE] [/SPOILER]
Join Now! [QUOTE][URL=http://"http://mocro.net"]http://mocro.net[/URL][/QUOTE] [/CENTER]

item.dc:creator: @Purple_Gnome Purple Gnome
item.description:
@Purple_Gnome wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:3, topic:548168”][quote author=Purple Gnome link=topic=667074.msg4460725#msg4460725 date=1417433421]
Looks interested. Heading ingame now sir!
[/quote]

You know, if you’re going to create another account and post on your thread you should try and do it more discreetly next time around.[/quote]
What do you mean? Are you trying to say i’m a multi-Accounter? GG Bro. I can prove this is many ways that i’m not a multi-logger!

Read full topic

[CENTER][SIZE=1]Hi My Name is Mocro. First of all before i begin Sorry For My Bad English.[/SIZE]
